Name: Les Manley in: Lost in L.A.
About the game: It's the crime of the century, and only one Manley can solve it In the second game of Accolade’s Les Manley series of adventures, a stalker has been kidnapping celebrities, including Les’s friend Helmut Bean and his extravagant girlfriend LaFonda Turner. Les Manley must scour La La Land – sifting through out-of-work actors, rock stars and gorgeous babes – to unravel the mystery. From Hollywood Boulevard to Mulholland Mansions, take a walk on the wild side. Intuitive point and click interface Live video footage of real actors and actresses Real Southern California locations Rockin' L.A. soundtrack
